about_the_game:
Want to see what the hype is all about? Play the Cozy Room Decorator demo!

Restrictions:

  • Items in your catalog will be locked.
  • There are no achievements in the demo.
  • Online features such as the community gallery are disabled.
  • You cannot save your rooms.

What are you waiting for? Try the demo today!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: CentOS 7 or other newer Linux OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 | AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: CentOS 7 or other newer LinuxOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 | AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: This whimsical isometric room design game invites you to unleash your inner interior decorator. Dive into a world of boundless imagination and creativity with a treasure trove of thousands of items, each brimming with endless possibilities.
